Description:
Coordinate product, event, or content email marketing campaigns, including copy, scheduling, testing, and database management.
Manage various marketing campaigns, such as email, event, or content marketing and coordinate the database and copy scheduling
Creating a thorough plan for the execution, working with the vendors to organize and supervise logistics, and managing registrations, among other things.
Upholding a cooperative relationship with outside vendors to ensure the prompt and effective execution of the marketing program.Skills
Skills:
Be a self-starter and able to independently move projects forward, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines.
Expertise in managing project management and keen attention to detail.
Must be able to independently advance projects by setting priorities and adhering to deadlines.
Ability to advance projects independently and within the deadline by setting tasks according to priority.
